result.reason: RDP copy-paste functionality incorrectly filters out numbers when a non-EN-US keyboard layout is used, hindering international user experience.
result.approach: Investigate keyboard input handling within RdpProtocol.cs to ensure proper processing of key events, particularly for numbers, across various keyboard layouts, possibly by adjusting input filtering or character mapping logic.
